pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Need a new task? I've got a job for you.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 想要一个新任务？我正好有一份任务给你。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> New threats have been spotted, I need you to wipe them out.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 发现新的敌人，我需要你消灭它们。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> You know the drill. Kill them until the job is done.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 你知道该怎么做，击杀它们直到任务完成。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Fresh blood's been scented. Get it done.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 鲜血散发着香味，快干掉它。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> I've got a new task for you. Good luck.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 我有一个新任务要给你，祝你好运。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> What do you want? You've got a job to do.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 你还想要什么？你的任务还没完成呢。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Stop bothering me. Get to the task.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 别再烦我了，快去做任务。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> You're not getting another task until you finish this one.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 你不能开始新任务，除非你完成当前任务。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Complete your mission, then come back to me.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 完成你的任务之后再回来找我。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> I'm not going to give you another task until this one is done. Get to it.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 我不想给你新任务，除非你完成当前任务，快去做。

pairs.key: §eYou've completed your slayer task and have been awarded
pairs.value: §e你完成了杀手任务并且获得

pairs.key: §ePress Z to access the slayer and skill menu.
pairs.value: §e按Z键进入杀手任务界面和技能界面。

pairs.key: §cYou don't have a Slayer Task, Press Z!
Your Slayer Task and Task Streak have been reset.
pairs.value: 你的杀手任务和任务连胜已被重置。

pairs.key: §cYou've canceled your slayer task. Your task streak has been reset.
pairs.value: §cYou've canceled your slayer task. Your task streak has been reset.

pairs.key: §cYou cannot cancel your task unless you tick the checkbox.
pairs.value: §cYou cannot cancel your task unless you tick the checkbox.

pairs.key: §cYou currently do not have a slayer task assigned.
pairs.value: §cYou currently do not have a slayer task assigned.
§c<凋灵> 我们一直在注视着。
§c<凋灵> 你的末日即将来临。

pairs.key: §4The Wither is charging up! Prepare to block!
pairs.value: §4The Wither is charging up! Prepare to block!

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> My domain will not be challenged!
pairs.value: §c<Elder Guardian> My domain will not be challenged!

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> My domain will not be challenged!
pairs.value: §c<Elder Guardian> My domain will not be challenged!

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> The waves will crush you!
pairs.value: §c<Elder Guardian> The waves will crush you!

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> I will not die like this!
pairs.value: §c<Elder Guardian> I will not die like this!

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> I was promised to rule!
pairs.value: §c<Elder Guardian> I was promised to rule!

pairs.key: §4Kill the Elder Guardian's summoned beacon before it heals!
pairs.value: §4Kill the Elder Guardian's summoned beacon before it heals!

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> Die to your own blade!
pairs.value: §c<Elder Guardian> Die to your own blade!

pairs.key: §4Get away from your friends, you're about to overcharge!
pairs.value: §4Get away from your friends, you're about to overcharge!

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Hear me from the shadows...
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Hear me from the shadows...

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Every move we make they see...
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Every move we make they see...

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> You will not know their pain...
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> You will not know their pain...

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Not even I could help them...
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Not even I could help them...

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Let your sins be cleansed.
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Let your sins be cleansed.

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Purge yourself from your sins.
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Purge yourself from your sins.

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> The shadows come for revenge.
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> The shadows come for revenge.

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Each of you... colors in this blank void?
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Each of you... colors in this blank void?

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Curious, your souls are different...
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Curious, your souls are different...

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Beautiful colors... I've missed them so...
pairs.value: §c<Ender Guardian> Beautiful colors... I've missed them so...

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Fall t' the throne o' ice!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Fall t' the throne o' ice!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye dare attack the cap'n o' winter's bane!?
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye dare attack the cap'n o' winter's bane!?

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Davy jones' locker couldn't stop me, wha' makes ye reckon ye can!?
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Davy jones' locker couldn't stop me, wha' makes ye reckon ye can!?

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Get out here 'n help yer cap'n!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Get out here 'n help yer cap'n!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll nah be leavin' here alive!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll nah be leavin' here alive!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll ne'er scuttle me ye yellow-bellied cur!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll ne'er scuttle me ye yellow-bellied cur!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> I'll fight till me last breath!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> I'll fight till me last breath!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> I've come closer t' death than this!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> I've come closer t' death than this!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll freeze where ye stand!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll freeze where ye stand!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> The sea be mine t' freeze!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> The sea be mine t' freeze!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Rip 'em apart, shoot the cannons!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Rip 'em apart, shoot the cannons!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Me crystal will make quick work o' ye!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Me crystal will make quick work o' ye!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> See if ye can handle me crystal bomb ye wee scallywag!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> See if ye can handle me crystal bomb ye wee scallywag!

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye bore me! Hit 'em wit' the crystal bomb!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye bore me! Hit 'em wit' the crystal bomb!

pairs.key: §4Kill Hoar Frost's summoned crystal before it explodes!
pairs.value: §4Kill Hoar Frost's summoned crystal before it explodes!

pairs.key: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> The high throne will hear of this treason!
pairs.value: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> The high throne will hear of this treason!

pairs.key: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> Fall to the throne's guard!
pairs.value: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> Fall to the throne's guard!

pairs.key: §c<Ignis> I will shatter you from your core!
pairs.value: §c<Ignis> I will shatter you from your core!

pairs.value: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE HIT ME??

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> ME CRUSH TINY CREATURE!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> ME CRUSH TINY CREATURE!

pairs.value: §c<The Big One> ANT BITE ME HAHA!

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> ME HATE TINY CREATURE!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> ME HATE TINY CREATURE!

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE GO UP!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE GO UP!

pairs.value: §c<Land Golem> I will not be killed so easily!

pairs.value: §c<Land Golem> My minions will protect me!

pairs.key: §c<Land Golem> Quit messing around, get them!

pairs.value: §c<Land Golem> This tower will not fall!

pairs.key: §7Attacking burning entities deals 100% additional AOE fire damage to all entities within an 8 block range.
pairs.value: §7Attacking burning entities deals 100% additional AOE fire damage to all entities within an 8 block range.

pairs.key: §7Deal +50% additional physical damage per empty armor slot.
pairs.value: §7Deal +50% additional physical damage per empty armor slot.

pairs.key: §7Kills apply Strength for 30 seconds to all players within 15 blocks. Effect stacks with additional kills, capping at level 30. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7Kills apply Strength for 30 seconds to all players within 15 blocks. Effect stacks with additional kills, capping at level 30. Can only proc from monster entities.

pairs.key: §7Kills apply Regeneration for 30 seconds to all players within 15 blocks. Effect stacks with additional kills, capping at level 30. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7Kills apply Regeneration for 30 seconds to all players within 15 blocks. Effect stacks with additional kills, capping at level 30. Can only proc from monster entities.

pairs.key: §7Attacking entities with at least 90% health deals 4x additional physical damage.
pairs.value: §7Attacking entities with at least 90% health deals 4x additional physical damage.

pairs.key: §7Deal additional magic damage based on your current Slayer Task streak.
pairs.value: §7Deal additional magic damage based on your current Slayer Task streak.

pairs.key: §7Kills apply Wither 10 for 5 seconds to all entities within 8 blocks.
pairs.value: §7Kills apply Wither 10 for 5 seconds to all entities within 8 blocks.

pairs.key: §7Kills have a 20% chance to summon a friendly Vindicator to attack nearby entities for 30 seconds. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7Kills have a 20% chance to summon a friendly Vindicator to attack nearby entities for 30 seconds. Can only proc from monster entities.

pairs.key: §7Deal 3x additional damage to bosses. Damage dealt is typeless and pierces defence.
pairs.value: §7Deal 3x additional damage to bosses. Damage dealt is typeless and pierces defence.

pairs.key: §7Taking critical damage while holding this item will save your location. Upon dying, you'll be teleported back to where the critical damage was received. Will only work in the Overworld.
pairs.value: §7Taking critical damage while holding this item will save your location. Upon dying, you'll be teleported back to where the critical damage was received. Will only work in the Overworld.

pairs.key: §7Kills enhance your defence, causing you to gain a random amount of armor for 1 minute. Armor received varies between 6 and 24. Value rerolls on additional kills and will remove on death.
pairs.value: §7Kills enhance your defence, causing you to gain a random amount of armor for 1 minute. Armor received varies between 6 and 24. Value rerolls on additional kills and will remove on death.

pairs.key: §7Dodging an attack from the Dodge skill will cause you to heal the amount you would have taken. Healing received is fixed and cannot be amplified.
pairs.value: §7Dodging an attack from the Dodge skill will cause you to heal the amount you would have taken. Healing received is fixed and cannot be amplified.

pairs.key: §7Kills have a 5% chance to grant skill points based on your current Slayer Task streak x 5. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7Kills have a 5% chance to grant skill points based on your current Slayer Task streak x 5. Can only proc from monster entities.

pairs.key: §7Your Health Regeneration skill heals twice as fast while this item is held.
pairs.value: §7Your Health Regeneration skill heals twice as fast while this item is held.

pairs.key: §cYou cannot add the same rune to one item.
pairs.value: §cYou cannot add the same rune to one item.

pairs.key: §cYou cannot add more than 3 runes to one item.
pairs.value: §cYou cannot add more than 3 runes to one item.

pairs.value: §cThere are no runes to remove from this item.

pairs.key: §cIf playing on LAN or Essential servers, you may experience constant kicks on §eOwlkin §cand §eVoid Wyvern§c. Other Origins may experience kicks, but not as often. If you're playing on dedicated, these kicks will not occur and you can ignore this.
